definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Meteorologists advised the public to wear face masks to ward off dust.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家建议公众外出时戴口罩。

sentences.english: As a matter of meteorology, Mr Fugate has a point.
sentences.chinese: 从气象学角度看，富盖特先生有自己的观点。

sentences.english: I was very fascinated with meteorology at a young age.
sentences.chinese: 小时候我曾对气象学非常着迷。

sentences.english: The low-frequency motions are considered to be meteorologically significant.
sentences.chinese: 低频运动在气象学上是很重要的。

sentences.english: After he got the Doctor's Dearee of Meteorology, he returned to China.
sentences.chinese: 获得气象学博士学位后，竺可桢回国。

sentences.english: Atmospheric physics and meteorology are complex.
sentences.chinese: 大气物理学和气象学是复杂的。

sentences.english: The weather scientists predicted a fine summer.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家预报，今夏将风调雨顺。

sentences.english: Meteorologists are one group that has a ready grasp of this idea.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家是对这种思想有领会的一个群体。

sentences.english: Meteorologist Zhou Yuehua said La Nina was to blame for the drought.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家周月华表示，拉尼娜是造成旱情的原因。

sentences.english: Meteorology is a very practical science because everyone is concerned about the weather.
sentences.chinese: 气象学是一门非常实用的科学，因为人人都关注天气。

sentences.english: South Georgia suffers from a meteorological version of bi¬polar disorder.
sentences.chinese: 南乔治亚遭受着一种气象学形式的轻躁症之苦。

sentences.english: Meteorologists reckon the rains due in October and November will be heavier than usual.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家预计，十月和十一月的雨水会比往常多。

sentences.english: One person who got it right was meteorologist Eric Holthaus.
sentences.chinese: 气象学家埃里克的操作方法是正确的。

sentences.english: The terminology of meteorology rises every time the temperature falls.
sentences.chinese: 每当降温时，气象学术语的热度都随之升高。

definition: the study of seasonal phenomena (flouring, migration etc)
natural phenomena of a seasonal nature
